title: SURGE-WSI Brand Color Palette
prompt: Create a brand color palette reference sheet for SURGE-WSI. Display color swatches in organized sections: PRIMARY COLORS - 'Deep Navy' (#0F172A, backgrounds), 'Royal Blue' (#3B82F6, primary actions), 'Cyan' (#06B6D4, highlights). SEMANTIC COLORS - 'Bullish Green' (#10B981, profits/buy), 'Bearish Red' (#EF4444, losses/sell), 'Warning Yellow' (#FBBF24, caution), 'Sideways Gray' (#6B7280, neutral). ACCENT COLORS - 'Gold' (#F59E0B, premium), 'Purple' (#8B5CF6, regime). Each swatch shows: color block, hex code, RGB values, usage description. Include gradient combinations. Show text contrast examples (white text on dark, dark text on light). Clean design system reference style.
negative_prompt: inconsistent swatch sizes, missing color codes, hard to read labels, unorganized layout
